local_intent: Execute top grasp at precomputed pose and secure it with stability verification.
assumptions: goal_pose was computed earlier and on the blackboard
Gripper is open and object is already aligned for grasp
coherence_with_global: Matches the global sequence segment: check pose availability, perform GraspAtPose(top, 2000), then CloseGripper(20,1000), then verify with IsGraspStable.
